class.name: Warlord
class.shortfluff: You rally your companions with a mixture of shouted commands and cunning stratagems, leading them to victory through superior tactics.
class.keyability: Charisma Armor Cloth Leather Hide Chainmail Shield Heavy Weapon Simple melee Military melee Simple ranged Fortitude +1 Will +1 12 5 7 Diplomacy, Heal, or Intimidate 3 Where a marshal leads their allies through example and might of arm, a tactician does his or her job through a steely presence. While a tactician may very well be an excellent warrior, it is his or her tactical acumen, eye for opportunity and inspiring countenance that form the basis of his or her abilities. That does not mean that a tactician prefers to stay far away from battle. The eye of battle affords the most opportunities for him or her to seize the chance and turn even the hardest battle into an easy victory. Leader's Strategy Every tactician has a knack with a certain kind of leadership. Choose one of Battlefront Leader, Canny Leader, or Combat Leader to represent your knack. Battlefront Leader You gain proficiency with heavy shields, and the battlefront shift power. Battlefront Shift Warlord Utility As combat breaks out, you give a quick call, urging an ally to move or spurring yourself to take action Encounter Martial No Action Close burst 5 bold Trigger: You roll initiative bold Target: You or one one ally in the burst 1 italic Level 11: You and one ally, or two allies 1 italic Level 21: You and two allies, or three allies true bold Effect: The target shifts half his or her speed. Combat Challenge In combat, it is dangerous to ignore a fighter. Every time you attack an enemy, whether the attack hits or misses, you can choose to mark that target until the end of your next turn. While the target is marked, it takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls of attacks that do not include you as a target. A creature can be subject to only one mark at a time, with a new mark superseding a mark that was already in place. In addition, you gain the enforce challenge power. If you are an eladrin, you can choose to gain the feywild enforcement power instead. Enforce Challenge Fighter Attack It is dangerous to ignore your challenge At-Will Martial, Weapon Immediate Interrupt Melee weapon bold Trigger: An enemy marked by you and within your reach either shifts or makes an attack that doesn't target you bold Target: The triggering enemy true bold Effect: You make a melee basic attack against the target.
